name: Puchi Pooches
description:
Made in 72 hours for Ludum Dare 38!

Story

You are Solomin, the sole living survivor of an ancient canine race. Armed with your trusty「many bombs」, it's up to you to defeat the alien menace. Buckle up and get ready to blast your way through several or a few exciting levels in this single player action video game!

Gamepad Controls (Recommended):
  • Movement: Left Analog
  • Aim Bombs: Right Analog
  • Throw Bomb: R2 or L2 (Hold for more range)
  • Jetpack: Cross or R1 or L1
Keyboard Controls:
  • Movement: WASD
  • Aim Bombs: Mouse
  • Throw Bombs: Left Click (Hold for more range)
  • Jetpack: Spacebar
Miscellaneous Controls:
  • Toggle Fullscreen: F
  • Change Window Size: + or -
  • Quit: Escape
For Linux Users

To play Puchi Pooches on Linux you will need to install the official Love2d packages over at https://www.love2d.org. Sorry that this is not more convenient... The year of the Linux desktop will be soon, I promise.
